sentence.Network_en: He took a vow of chastity and celibacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他发下守贞禁欲的誓言。

sentence.Network_en: Chastity before marriage is still demanded in some societies.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些社会仍要求婚前保持贞洁.

sentence.Network_en: Chastity was as deep ingrained in them as Party loyalty.
sentence.Network_cn: 禁欲的思想,如同对党的忠诚,早已在她们的心里根深蒂固.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 四月十六日生日花：野生郁金香（wild tulip）花语：贞操（chastity）野生郁金香生长在地中海沿岸，是所有郁金香的 -----四月十七日 …
花语：贞节(chastity) 开黄绿色花朵的长春藤，蔓生于全欧洲及北亚。它全长可以达叁十公尺，而且紧紧的缠绕着墙壁、树干。
(1) 贞洁(chastity)、贫穷及服从三愿是奉献给基督的特殊方式之特征。自古这三愿就成了修会生活的特征。
GRE分类词汇--by 武汉新东方刘畅_百度文库 ... （hygeian adj. 健康的，卫生的） （chastity n. 贞节，纯洁） （pure adj. 纯洁的）.

list.abs: They have different chastity ideas in the different social history stages ., 不同的社会历史阶段有不同的贞操观念.
贞操带(chastity belt)加“妇炎洁”——爱情是契约吗?分类:文字的马 2006-02-27 19:26 阅读(?)分享评论(0) 无论是霍布斯、洛克还是卢梭的契约理论,无一.
... - Chastity belts 贞操带;（贞操带）:;贞草带; - chastity viewpoint 贞节观; - Chastity lifestyle 例如守贞生活形态.
Enforced chastity(强制贞操)Examinations (physical)(身体检查/审查)Exercise (forced/required)(运动、强迫/要求)Exhibitionism (friends)(露阴、向朋友)Exhibitionism.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French chastete, from Latin castitas, from castus 'morally pure' (see chaste)

entry.def: Chastity is the state of not having sex with anyone, or of only having sex with your husband or wife.

example.ex: He took a vow of chastity and celibacy.
example.tran: 他发下守贞禁欲的誓言。

means.word_mean: 1. abstaining from sexual relations (as because of religious vows)
2. morality with respect to sexual relations

auth_sentence.content: Jesuits take vows of poverty, chastity and obedience.

auth_sentence.content: Instead of practicing poverty, chastity, and obedience.
